import React from 'react'; import { DollarSign, AlertTriangle, Clock, Users } from 'lucide-react'; const ARSummaryCards = ({ summary, customers }) => { return (

Total A/R

${summary.totalAR.toFixed(2)}

{summary.customersWithBalance} customers with balances

Overdue Amount

${summary.totalOverdue.toFixed(2)}

{((summary.totalOverdue / summary.totalAR) * 100).toFixed(1)}% of total A/R

Avg. Days Outstanding

{summary.avgDaysOutstanding}

Collection performance

Active Customers

{customers.length}

Total customer accounts

); }; export default ARSummaryCards;
